entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , La Scie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:19 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Scie 6:30 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: -11.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -13.4°C
Wind: SSE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Snow beginning near noon. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southeast 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the evening then southwest 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023
